attributes.review: I saw so many reviews saying this app has caused death and I didn’t Believe it until my grandpa downloaded it he saw trumps face and had a heart attack and died. And caused a virus called orangenes and now my grandma has it and got pregnant and came out with a famous dog and died then it passed it to the dog which was getting married to bob and now bob got pregnant and he is not happy with it.
attributes.title: Caused death

attributes.review: this app is most definitely CURSED and i am SO ANGRY this is even permitted on the apple store!!! immediately after downloading my phone literally started BREAKING. my touch screen stopped working and there was A LITTLE ORANGE MAN FLOATING AROUND MY SCREEN AND I COULDNT GET RID OF HIM😡😡😡 after that it got WORSE. my sister contacted me and told me SHE SLEPT WITH MY HUSBAND AND THE NEW HOUSE I BOUGHT WAS INFESTED WITH COCKROACHES!!!!!!! DO NOT download this  unless you want to be CURSED with EXTREME BAD LUCK!!!!! i WARNED YOU.
attributes.title: this app is CURSED!!!!😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: I came to the app to try and see why I should vote for him since I’m old enough to vote now. I logged on and found no help and no reasons why I should. No GOOD reasons why I should. I kept the app for 3 days going on it everyday and I still did not find any good reasons. So I am not voting for him. No good reasons and the app didn’t help at all. Bad app.
attributes.title: This app isn’t helping.

attributes.review: so i downloaded the app while i was on the toilet pooping✨and i got soo entertained for 20 hours and i got stuck and couldn’t get out of the toilet 😪i have a phobia of cheeto puffs and right when i opens the app i saw one 😱i got so scared that i jumped off the toilet finally but then i ran to my window and jumped out of my window and now i have a broken leg and arm😤😭🤕
attributes.title: THIS APP BROKE MY LEG AND ARM 😡

attributes.review: This app wasn’t the best I’ve seen. It kept crashing whenever I tried to open it; but IF I did I couldn’t even do anything. All it did was freeze and crash. I highly don’t recommend this app. To at insult to injury the whole display and look was honestly atrocious. Could have been better but what can you expect.
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: I don’t know where to begin, first this app glitches any time I open it. It even made my grandfather explode! Then when I downloaded it again random pictures of an orange man kept coming up! You can imagine the horror of trying to find reasons to vote for our president then BOOM jump scare! I strongly don’t recommend this app.
attributes.title: Terrible. Do NOT download!!

attributes.review: This is very important I’m am just trying to support my president and it was not working very glitchy and I keep seeing an orange face apear and dissapere very scary I think it’s hunted my a Cheeto 🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠⚫️⚫️
attributes.title: Very glitchy and not working correctly

attributes.review: This app has done nothing but promote ONLY the news President Trump wishes you to see, there is no actual informative aspect to this app other than you being spoon-fed Trump propaganda. This app only benefits privileged white men and nothing more. It promotes racism, sexism, and homophobia. Disappointing app, if you wish to create an app for the President please run it less like a communist would.
attributes.title: Serious Review

attributes.review: Just downloading this app my phone kept crashing with the amount of notifications and after a while my phone had a bug. I had to get a whole new phone just from the issues this app gave me on my old phone. Just no, don’t download this app absolutely not worth it.
attributes.title: Don’t download this app!

attributes.review: If I were to give it a rating of zero, I would. THIS APP IS THE REASON MY CAT DIED. I had such a hard time working it and understand what our, BEAUTIFUL president was trying to spread, that I forgot to feed my cat for the next 3 days after I downloaded. My beautiful Sir trumpers the second lived a beautiful life and I will be hosting his funeral (mask free because my body my choice) Saturday evening.
attributes.title: Terrible App Killed my Cat
